title: Looking for fonts with extra fine serifs (similar to Lancôme Hypnôse ads)
content:
Hi,

I'm looking for the typeface used in the commercials for the parfum 'hypnôse' of Lancôme...

does anyone have an idea?

many many thanks in advance,

best, matthijs

url:  
 [http://www.lancome-usa.com/\_us/\_en/makeup/animations/hypnose06/gettheloo...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214011310/http:/www.lancome-usa.com/_us/_en/makeup/animations/hypnose06/getthelook.aspx?categorycode=AXEMakeup2&& "http://www.lancome-usa.com/\_us/\_en/makeup/animations/hypnose06/getthelook.aspx?categorycode=AXEMakeup2&&")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [getlook\_10.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214011310/http:/typophile.com/files/getlook_10.jpg) | 7.04 KB |
| [hypnose.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214011310/http:/typophile.com/files/hypnose.jpg) | 82.14 KB |
author: matthijs van Leeuwen

comments.content:
This looks like an extra-fine display weight of Minion. Is there a custom version running around that we don't know about?

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/minion/regular-display/testdrive.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214011310/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/minion/regular-display/testdrive.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/minion/regular-display/testdrive.html")

I think it has a stroke removed from it, seen up close it is actually less than fine.  
Tim

thanks marco&tim!...

It does look like a very very thin minion... so this basically means a custom-job?

I really like this super-super fine details... anyone a tip of typefaces, which come close to this design?

thanks,

m.

Other fonts I looked at before deciding it was a tweaked Minion:

Requiem  
 [http://www.typography.com/catalog/requiem/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214011310/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/requiem/index.html "http://www.typography.com/catalog/requiem/index.html")

Freight Big  
 [http://www.joshuadarden.com/shop/freightbig.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214011310/http:/www.joshuadarden.com/shop/freightbig.php "http://www.joshuadarden.com/shop/freightbig.php")

Also [David Berlow](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214011310/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20Berlow)'s [Throhand](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214011310/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Throhand), [El Dorado Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214011310/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=FB.103864.0.0) and [Phaistos](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214011310/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=FB.1054.0.0), his collaboration with [Just van Rossum](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214011310/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Just%20van%20Rossum).
